siteMetadata.title: Blog by Sam Perrin
siteMetadata.subtitle: Automation Consultant, currently working at Xtravirt. Interested in all things automation/devops related.

markdownRemark.html:
This is documented in the latest release notes, but to quickly disable SSLv3 on your FortiManager device, run the following;

config system global
set ssl-protocol tlsv1
end
